description:
So Mitch and Skyler.... I didn't think I would be able to pair Mitch up with anyone else other than his friend, Davis, but he is actually enjoying coming out here to visit, and the money doesn't hurt either.
Skyler was looking for more work and I asked him if there was anyone on the site he wanted to work with, and he said he thought Mitch was "interesting." I guess that is as close as Skyler is going to get to saying a guy is hot.
Once again I have two straight guys with two amazing dicks. Who should top? Both are packing pretty big sticks, and both wanted to put it to good use. In the end, we opted to do a flip-flop video.
I like these best. It shows versatility, and no one gets pegged as a top or bottom...although Mitch's unit is Top material, and Skyler's bubble bootie begs to be conquered.
The energy was super high on this one. Hope you enjoy!
title: Mitch & Skyler - RAW
